jd: From: Haasini, Softcom Systems Inc haasini@softcomsystems.com Reply to: haasini@softcomsystems.com Hi ,Hope you are doing well.We are looking for a AWS Cloud Developer (Java) in Atlanta, GA (Onsite) - Contract with one of our Clients. If you are available and interested then please reply to me with details below the Job Description along with your updated resume in Word format.If you're interested, you can reach me at 609-333-9000 Ext: 31 or Haasini@softcomsystems.com Position: AWS Cloud Developer (Java)/Cloud Software Developer (AWS)Locations: Atlanta, GA (Onsite)Duration: Contract Note: Need 10+ Years consultants only. Interview: (F2F interview required, if the candidate is nonlocal and ready to relocate on Day one, the candidate should be ready to go for inperson interview in any of LTIMindtree office location in US). Mandatory Skills: Java, SQL, Microservices, Strong AWS, Angular, CloudFormation, CloudWatch, Lambda, Job description: • Experience in AWS is must• Proficiency with Java, SQL, Microservices and Angular.• Experience working with streaming data and data extraction from different databases Oracle DB2 MySQL etc• Experienced with deploying and managing infrastructures based on Docker Kubernetes or OpenShift• Experience with scalable data extraction tools is a plus• Experience working with Kafka Aurora AWS Glue Redshift is a plus• Understanding of data engineering real time streaming andor eventing and json parsing• Experience with automating application deployment continuous delivery and continuous integration Jenkins Ansible etc• Experience building micro services and API architecture• Debugging troubleshooting skills• Must be flexible and have a passion to learn and collaborate with colleagues• Must have strong oral and written communication skills• Business Intelligence Analytics experience a plus• Embraces diverse people thinking and styles• Consistently makes safety and security of self and others the priority
